Name: LETHAL STRIKE
About the game: provides comfortable play with easy operation. the operating device can be played with the game pad or the keyboard. the game system is arcade style, and each stage progresses nonstop. shoot down enemy planes using vulcan and multi lock on missiles. there are 10 or more stages. The most distinctive part of the game is the barrel roll where the camera goes around the top and bottom. And direct the sense of speed with the afterburner. The feature of the score is the bonus of group defeat, and scoring will be raised by destroying without missing.
